title: Daisy Lowe sets pulses racing at Esquire Townhouse event
text:
She was recently romantically linked to singer Jack Peñate, following her split from Cameron McMeikan.

Yet Daisy Lowe made a solo appearance at the annual star-studded Esquire Townhouse launch with Breitling Swiss luxury watchmaker on Wednesday night in London.

The model, 30, set pulses racing as she put on a very leggy display in a tiny red slip midi dress with a daring thigh-high split.

Lady in red: Daisy Lowe made a solo appearance at the star-studded Esquire Townhouse launch on Wednesday night in London

Adding some lavish accessories, Daisy opted for black heels, a matching coloured handbag and gold jewellery.

The former Strictly Come Dancing star oozed Hollywood glamour as she styled her signature raven locks into a curly blow-dried half sweptback hairdo.

Daisy added a slick of red-carpet ready make-up which included black winged eyeliner and a bold red lipstick which matching her stunning dress.

The star knew how to work her best angles as she posed up a storm at the star-studded event.

Glamour: The model, 30, set pulses racing as she put on a very leggy display in a tiny red slip midi dress with a daring thigh-high split

Sultry: Adding some lavish accessories, Daisy opted for black heels, a matching coloured handbag and gold jewellery

Daisy joined the likes of Poldark star Eleanor Tomlinson, Queer Eye's Tan France, Dominic West and Erin O'Connor - to name a few.

Daisy is newly single after splitting from beau Cameron, 24, who she dated for almost a year before reportedly splitting over their six-year age gap.

Last week she was seen holding hands with musician Jack Peñate while they stepped out in a London park.

Jack's biggest hit to date is his 2007 song Torn on the Platform, and he also has two top 20 albums.

Work it: Poldark star Eleanor Tomlinson looked effortlessly chic in a plunging black trouser suit with a silver buckle on it

Strike a pose: The actress styled her signature fiery red locks into a curly tousled hairdo

Fabulous: Queer Eye star Tan France looked stylish in a black trouser suit with a Versace belt

Dapper: Dominic West looked dapper in a black suit with a crisp unbuttoned white shirt

Daisy and Cameron were first romantically linked when they were seen sharing a kiss during a low-key date in October last year.

A source told The Sun: 'They remain on good terms and Daisy is loving being single and hanging out with friends and family.

'She hasn't been on her own for ages and it feels like the right time.'

A source told The Mirror of their romance last year: 'It has been a while since Daisy had a serious boyfriend and she has grown really close to Cameron.

Elegant: Erin O'Connor looked effortlessly elegant in a black silk tuxedo-style dress

Work it: Roisin Murphy, left, and Johanna Konta, right, were also in attendance at the star-studded event

Bold look: Anna Brewster made a bold fashion statement with a ruffled lace blouse with a black neck bow and high-waisted trousers

'They have been secretly dating for months and really enjoy each other's company.'

Daisy, whose dating history includes The Crown's Matt Smith, Hurts singer Theo Hutchcraft and Thomas Cohen, was previously romantically linked to artist John Leigh.

Earlier this month it was also claimed Daisy and Strictly Come Dancing's AJ Pritchard reportedly 'hit it off' after meeting when she took part in the show in 2016

Smart: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch star Will Poulter looked smart in black trousers with a dark coloured shirt

Stylish: Wendell Pierce, left, and Aki Omoshaybi, right, both looked stylish at the star-studded event

Good spirits: Santino Smith and Edward Bluemel (L-R) appeared in good spirits as they posed for a photo together at the event

Attendees: Jack Penate, left, and Eric Underwood, right, were also in attendance

Daisy was partnered with professional Aljaz Skorjanec, 29, in the hit series.

Their alleged relationship is said to have been an open secret with the rest of the cast and gone down in 'Strictly folklore', reports the Sun.

Daisy has denied ever having been romantically linked with AJ.
